title: The Silken Hand
description: Whether the Hand has the documents or you do, they are making a move on the aqueducts. You must descend into the Undercity to stop them from poisoning the water supply.

turns.narrative: The Undercity aqueducts roar with rushing water. The control room is heavily guarded by Silken Hand mercenaries attempting to breach the main reservoir tank.
turns.consequence_a: You engage in a brutal fight on slippery catwalks. You defeat them, but the noise alerts the rest of the facility.
turns.consequence_b: The mercs plummet into the dark waters below. Silent and deadly, but you lose their loot.

turns.narrative: Inside the main control room, you find barrels of 'Liquid Scourge'. They are rigging it to the primary flow valves.
turns.consequence_a: During the fight, one barrel is punctured, severely poisoning the room. You take heavy poison damage but stop the rigging.
turns.choice_b: Use the facility controls to flush the valves
turns.consequence_b: The sudden pressure spike blasts the riggers away, safely sealing the system, but breaking the main valve in the process.

water_saved_intact.description: The water supply is safe and the infrastructure is intact.

water_saved_broken.description: The water is safe, but the broken valve means rationing for the Lower Ward.

conclusion: The water supply is safe and the infrastructure is intact.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with significant consequences to the district and involved factions.
